Home » 38P2 Dhammānuloma (1), Dukapaṭṭhānapāḷi (2) » 10 Mahantaraduka » 10.6 Cittasamuṭṭhānaduka » 10.6.1 Paṭiccavāra » 10.6.1.1 Paccayānuloma » 10.6.1.1.2 Saṅkhyāvāra
Suddha
Mahantaraduka
Cittasamuṭṭhānaduka
Paṭiccavāra
Paccayānuloma
Saṅkhyāvāra
Suddha
192.
2785Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe nava, adhipatiyā pañca, anantare nava, samanantare nava, sahajāte nava, aññamaññe nava, nissaye nava, upanissaye nava, purejāte pañca, āsevane pañca, kamme nava, vipāke nava, āhāre nava, indriye nava, jhāne nava, magge nava, sampayutte nava (sabbattha nava), avigate nava.
2786Anulomaṃ.
